info.name: Modernize Dreamhost User Profile
info.description: Dreamhost has a pretty nice looking custom control panel, but their User Profile pages are stuck in 1995. Wrote some pretty complex styles that make the User Pages look like the rest of Dreamhost. This is about as close to a pixel-perfect match as I could get : )
info.additionalInfo:
Beta v0.72 To add your own profile pic, provide a link to an image above. A 140px wide image currently works best.

Want to use a Gravatar Image?

If you've got a gravatar account and want to grab the image for it, please go to http://sandbox.onlinephpfunctions.com and enter in this line of code with your email address. Or fire it up in your local MAMP server : )
